original_text: Listen to his teaching. Remember carefully what he tells you. Listen to his teaching. Remember carefully what he tells you. Listen to his teaching. Remember carefully what he tells you. Listen to his teaching. Remember carefully what he tells you. Listen to his teaching.
korean_text: 청하건대 너는 하나님의 입에서 교훈을 받고 하나님의 말씀을 네 마음에 두라

sentences.original_text: Remember carefully what he tells you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 당신에게 말하는 것을 주의 깊게 기억하십시오.

sentences.original_text: Remember carefully what he tells you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 당신에게 말하는 것을 주의 깊게 기억하십시오.
